source: Op maandag kondigden wetenschappers van de Stanford University School of Medicine aan dat een nieuw diagnostisch hulpmiddel is uitgevonden dat cellen op type kan ordenen: een piepkleine af te drukken chip die voor waarschijnlijk ongeveer één dollarcent per stuk kan worden geproduceerd met behulp van standaard inkjetprinters.
reference: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced that they have developed a new diagnostic test that can detect cells of a certain type in a sample of blood: a tiny pie-shaped chip that can be produced using standard inkjet printers for about one U.S. cent per chip.

source: Hoofdonderzoekers zeggen dat dit kan leiden tot een vroege opsporing van kanker, tuberculose, HIV en malaria bij patiënten in arme landen. Hier zijn de overlevingskansen bij een aandoening als borstkanker de helft minder dan in rijke landen.
reference: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation: Dutch text: Researchers say that this is the first time that such a high percentage of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria cases have been reported among soldiers in the armed forces. Here are the highest rates of infection among soldiers in the armed forces.

source: De JAS 39C Gripen stortte rond 09.30 uur lokale tijd (02.30 UTC) neer op de landingsbaan en ontplofte. De luchthaven is hierdoor gesloten voor commerciële vluchten.
reference: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation: Dutch text: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed around 9.30 local time (0230 UTC) on the runway and exploded. The airport is now closed for commercial flights.

source: De piloot werd geïdentificeerd als majoor Dilokrit Pattavee.
reference: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation: Dutch text: The pilot was identified as Dilokrit Pattavee.

source: De lokale media meldt dat er tijdens een actie op de luchthaven een brandweerwagen is gekanteld.
reference: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation: Dutch text: Local media reports that a brand new car was stolen during an act of vandalism at the luchthaven.

source: De 28-jaar oude Vidal is drie seizoenen geleden van Sevilla naar Barça overgestapt.
reference: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation: 28-year-old Vidal has been on 28 games for Sevilla and Barcelona.

source: Sinds hij verhuisde naar de Catalaanse hoofdstad heeft hij 49 wedstrijden gespeeld voor de club.
reference: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation: Dutch text: I am not a fan of the Catalan football club, I have seen 49 matches for them.

source: Het protest begon rond 11.00 lokale tijd (UTC+1) op Whitehall, tegenover de door politie bewaakte ingang van Downing Street, de ambtswoning van de premier.
reference: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation: Dutch text: The protest started at 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall, in front of the Downing Street gate, the entrance to the Prime Minister's official residence.

source: Iets na 11.00 uur begonnen betogers het verkeer op de rijbaan in noordelijke richting in Whitehall te blokkeren.
reference: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation: Dutch text: 11.00 a.m. the protest started in Whitehall in the northbound carriageway.

source: Om 11:20 vroeg de politie aan de demonstranten om weer op de stoep te gaan staan, waarbij zij het recht aanhaalde om het recht op protest af te wegen tegen het toenemende verkeer.
reference: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation: Dutch text: At 11:20, the police closed the street to the demonstrators, forcing them to turn back to the street corner, where they were met by the riot police.

source: Vanaf 11.29 uur verplaatsten de demonstranten zich richting Whitehall, langs Trafalgar Square, de Strand, Aldwych en Kingsway naar Holborn. Hier werd het Spring Forum van de Conservative Party gehouden in het hotel Grand Connaught Rooms.
reference: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation: Dutch text: 11.29 a.m. the demonstrators started their march from Whitehall, Trafalgar Square, Strand, Aldwych and Kingsway towards Holborn. Here the Spring Forum of the Conservative Party was held in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

source: Het onderlinge record van Nadal tegen de Canadees is 7-2.
reference: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation: Nadal's record against the Canadians is 7-2.

source: Eerder leed hij een nederlaag tegen Raonic in de Brisbane Open.
reference: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translation: Dutch text: Eerder leed hij een nederlaag tegen Raonic in the Brisbane Open.

source: Nadal won 88% van de netpunten in de wedstrijd, waardoor hij 76 punten behaalde in de eerste service.
reference: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translation: Nadal won 88% of his points in the first serve, 76 points in the first service.

source: Na de wedstrijd zei De Gravelkoning, 'Ik ben gewoon blij dat ik weer in de laatste rondes van de belangrijkste wedstrijden sta. Ik ga dit proberen te winnen.'
reference: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translation: Dutch text: On the day of the wedding, the bride-to-be, "I am so happy to be the last of the brides to be. I will try to win this prize."

source: Het overkoepelde begrip de 'Panama Papers' verwijst naar de ongeveer tien miljoen documenten van het Panamese advocatenkantoor Mossack Fonseca die in de lente van 2016 naar de pers zijn gelekt.
reference: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation: Dutch text: The leaked Panama Papers have been translated into ten thousand documents by the Panama attorney Mossack Fonseca, in 2016.

source: Uit de documenten blijkt dat veertien banken rijke klanten hielpen bij het verbergen van miljarden Amerikaanse dollars aan rijkdommen om belastingen en andere regelgeving te omzeilen.
reference: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation: Dutch text: The Dutch text is a translation of the document, which is a statement by the Dutch banks that they have received from the United States of America a total of $ 1 billion in order to cover the costs and other expenses.

source: Volgens de Britse krant The Guardian beheerde Deutsche Bank ongeveer een op de drie van de 1200 hierbij betrokken lege vennootschappen.
reference: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translation: Dutch text: According to the British newspaper The Guardian Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.

source: Er werd wereldwijd geprotesteerd, verschillende strafrechtelijke vervolgingen werden opgestart en de regeringsleiders van IJsland en Pakistan traden af.
reference: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation: Dutch text: The world is witnessing a global protest, various civil society organizations are starting to operate and the governments of Iceland and Pakistan are responding.

source: De in Hongkong geboren Ma studeerde aan de New York University en Harvard Law School en had ooit een Amerikaanse 'green card', een permanente verblijfsvergunning.
reference: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translation: Dutch text: Ma, born in Hong Kong, studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and obtained a US green card, a permanent residence permit.

source: Tijdens de verkiezingen liet Hsieh doorschemeren dat Ma gedurende een crisistijd het land zou kunnen ontvluchten.
reference: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translation: Dutch text: Hsieh's testimony on the doorstep of the temple is a reminder of Ma's leadership.

source: Volgens Hsieh was de fotogenieke Ma wel stijlvol, maar had ze niet zo bar veel inhoud.
reference: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translation: Dutch text: After Hsieh, Ma was the most photogenic of the Ma's, but he had less substance.

source: Hoewel deze beschuldigingen werden geuit, won Ma eenvoudig op een platform dat zich hard maakte voor nauwere banden met het Chinese vasteland.
reference: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation: In the end, all these excuses will be forgotten, and Ma will be remembered as the man who made a breakthrough in the Chinese mainland.

source: De Speler van de Dag is Alex Ovechkin van de Washington Capitals.
reference: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translation: The Washington Capitals' Alex Ovechkin is the Player of the Day.

source: In de wedstrijd waarin Washington met 5-3 van de Atlanta Thrashers won, maakte hij 2 doelpunten en 2 assists.
reference: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translation: Dutch text: In the afternoon of the Washington, the Atlanta Thrashers won 5-3. He made 2 goals and 2 assists.

source: Ovechkins eerste assist van de avond was op het winnende doelpunt van debutant Nicklas Backstrom;
reference: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translation: Dutch text: Ovechkin's first assist of the season was on the winning goal of Nicklas Backstrom;

source: Zijn tweede doelpunt van de avond was zijn 60ste van het seizoen. Hierdoor werd hij de eerste speler die sinds het seizoen van 1995-1996 zestig of meer doelpunten scoorde. In dat seizoen bereikten Jaromir Jagr en Mario Lemieux allebei die mijlpaal.
reference: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation: Dutch text: Zijn tweede doelpunt van de avond was zijn 60ste van het seizoen. Hierdoor werd hij de eerste speler die sinds het seizoen van 1995-1996 zestig of meer doelpunten scoorde. In dat seizoen bereikten Jaromir Jagr en Mario Lemieux allebei die mijlpaal.

source: Batten stond in 2008 op plaats 190 op de lijst van de 400 rijkste Amerikanen met een geschat vermogen van 2,3 miljard dollar.
reference: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translation: Dutch text: Batten was ranked 190th on the list of 400 richest Americans in 2008 with a net worth of $2.3 billion.

source: In 1950 haalde hij een diploma aan het College of Arts & Sciences aan de universiteit van Virginia en later doneerde hij er veel geld aan.
reference: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translation: Dutch text: In 1950 he graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia and later worked for many years for the university.

source: Bij een oproer staken mensen de Abu Ghraib-gevangenis in Irak in brand.
reference: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translation: Dutch text: A prisoner of war from Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq is being held.

source: De gevangenis werd berucht toen misbruik van gevangenen aan het licht kwam, nadat de Amerikaanse strijdkrachten het hadden overgenomen.
reference: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translation: Dutch text: The Dutch translation of the word "Gevangenis" is "Gevangenstern", which is the Dutch translation of the English word "Glory".

source: Piquet Jr. crashte in de Grand Prix van Singapore in 2008, net nadat Fernando Alonso al vroeg een pitstop maakte, waarbij de safety car de baan opkwam.
reference: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, after Fernando Alonso had a pit stop, causing the safety car to come in.

source: Terwijl de wagens vóór Alonso onder de safety car gingen bijtanken, nam hij de koppositie in om de overwinning te pakken.
reference: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation: Dutch text: As the safety car came in to take Alonso out, the race was put on hold until the safety car was taken out.

source: Piquet jr. werd in 2009 ontslagen na de Grand Prix van Hongarije.
reference: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation: Dutch text: Piquet Jr. was in 2009 on the Hongarije Grand Prix podium.

source: Om precies 8.46 uur werd het doodstil in de stad. Dit was ook precies het moment waarop het eerste vliegtuig zijn doel raakte.
reference: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation: Dutch text: At 8.46 a.m. the clock struck the first stroke. That was the moment when the first train arrived.

source: Er zijn twee lichtbundels geplaatst die 's nachts omhoog schijnen.
reference: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation: Dutch text: There are two light bulbs that are switched on at night.

source: Er wordt momenteel aan vijf nieuwe wolkenkrabbers gebouwd, met een transportcentrum en een gedenkpark in het midden.
reference: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation: Dutch text: It is currently under construction for a new five-star hotel, with a transport center and a park in the middle.

source: De PBS-show heeft meer dan twintig Emmy's gewonnen en ze zijn korter op de buis dan Mister Rogers' Neighborhood en Sesamstraat.
reference: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation: Dutch text: The PBS show has won more Emmy awards than any other show and has its own street called Sesame Street.

source: Elke aflevering van het programma richtte zich op een thema uit een bepaald boek, waarna dat thema verder werd verkend door middel van meerdere verhalen.
reference: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation: Dutch text: Each episode of the program would focus on a theme from a book, and then explore that theme through multiple stories.

source: Elke show bevatte ook tips voor boeken die kinderen in hun bibliotheek konden vinden.
reference: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation: Dutch text: Every show has tips for books that children in your library should read.

source: John Grant van WNED Buffalo (het station van Reading Rainbow), zei: 'Reading Rainbow liet kinderen zien waarom ze moeten lezen... bracht hen de liefde voor lezen bij - [de show] spoorde kinderen aan om een boek te pakken en te gaan lezen.'
reference: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation: Dutch text: John Grant from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow station), says: 'Reading Rainbow teaches kids why to read... by showing them the book, reading aloud to them, and then asking them to read a book.'

source: Sommige mensen, zoals John Grant, geloven dat de serie aan haar eind is gekomen vanwege de financiële crisis en een verschuiving in de filosofie van educatieve televisieprogrammering.
reference: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation: Dutch text: Some men, including John Grant, have argued that the series has been abandoned because of the financial crisis and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming.

source: De storm bevindt zich ongeveer 645 mijl (1040 km) ten westen van de Kaapverdische Eilanden en zal volgens voorspellers waarschijnlijk zijn uitgeraasd voor het vasteland wordt bedreigd.
reference: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation: Dutch text: The storm is located 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands and is moving towards the west at a speed of about 8 kph.

source: Momenteel bereikt Fred windsnelheden van 105 mijl per uur (165 km/u) en beweegt de strom zich in noordwestelijke richting.
reference: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation: Moments ago, Fred was at 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and was moving in the northwest direction.

source: Fred is de sterkste tropische orkaan die sinds de komst van satellietbeelden ooit zo ver in het zuiden en oosten van de Atlantische oceaan is gemeten. Het is slechts de derde grote orkaan die ten oosten van 35°W is gemeten.
reference: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation: Dutch text: Fred is the most southerly tropical cyclone ever recorded in the Atlantic Ocean. It is the third largest cyclone ever recorded in the 35°W area.

source: Op 24 september 1759 sloot Arthur Guinness een huurcontract van 9000 jaar voor de St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ierland.
reference: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation: Dutch text: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.

source: 250 jaar later is Guinness een wereldwijd bedrijf dat ieder jaar 10 miljard euro (US$ 14,7 miljard) omzet draait.
reference: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation: 250 years later, Guinness is a global business that turns 10 million euros (US$ 14.7 billion) every year.

source: Jonny Reid, bijrijder van het A1GP-team van Nieuw-Zeeland, ging vandaag de geschiedenis boeken in door op legale manier de snelst tijd neer te zetten op de 48-jaar oude Auckland Harbour Bridge in Nieuw-Zeeland.
reference: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation: Dutch text: Jonny Reid, A1GP driver for the A1GP team of New Zealand, today signed the book of record for the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand.

source: Het lukte dhr. Reid om met Black Beauty, de A1GP-auto van Nieuw-Zeeland, maar liefst 7 keer met een snelheid van meer dan 160 km/u over de brug te rijden.
reference: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation: Dutch text: The black beauty, the A1GP car, of Nieuw-Zeeland, is currently driving at 7km/h over a straight road at 160km/h.

source: De Nieuw-Zeelandse politie kon nauwelijks met hun lasergun vaststellen hoe snel de heer Reid ging, vanwege de lage wegligging van Black Beauty. De enige keer dat de politie het voor elkaar kreeg om de snelheid van de heer Reid vast te stellen, was toen hij het tempo terugbracht tot 160 km/u.
reference: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation: Dutch text: The New Zealand's political system is based on the principle of parliamentary democracy, with the exception of the military, which is under the control of the Prime Minister.

source: In de afgelopen 3 maanden zijn er meer dan 80 arrestanten uit de Central Booking-inrichting vrijgelaten zonder dat ze officieel zijn aangeklaagd.
reference: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation: Dutch text: In the last 3 months, 80 arrests were made at the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.

source: In april van dit jaar heeft rechter Glynn een tijdelijk contactverbod tegen de faciliteit uitgevaardigd om zo de vrijlating van mensen af te dwingen die 24 uur na hun verbalisering nog werden vastgehouden en voor wie nog geen hoorzitting van een gerechtscommissaris mogelijk was.
reference: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation: Dutch text: In April, Glynn sent a letter to the commissioner of the Facilities Commission requesting a 24-hour verbal response to complaints about the lack of toilet paper and the lack of a 24-hour response from the commissioner.

source: De commissaris bepaalt, indien van toepassing, de borgtocht en maakt de aanklachten formeel die zijn ingediend door de arresterende agent. De aanklachten worden vervolgens in het computersysteem van de staat ingevoerd, waarna de zaak wordt bijgehouden.
reference: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation: Dutch text: The commissioner is the chief of the police, the inspector is in charge of the traffic, and the traffic officer is responsible for the enforcement of the traffic rules.

source: Vanaf de hoorzitting heeft de verdachte ook recht op een snel proces.
reference: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation: Dutch text: Before the process of the dyeing, the cloth is washed in hot water.

source: Peter Costello, de Australische minister van Financiën en de man die hoogstwaarschijnlijk premier John Howard zal opvolgen als liberale partijleider, is een groot voorstander van kernenergie in Australië.
reference: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation: Dutch text: Peter Costello, the Australian Minister of Finance and the man most likely to become the Liberal Party leader, is a big supporter of nuclear energy in Australia.

source: Meneer Costello zei dat Australië moet inzetten op het gebruik van kernenergie zodra dit economisch haalbaar is.
reference: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation: Dutch text: Mr Costello said Australia should pursue the use of nuclear energy, even if it means economic hardship.

source: 'Zodra het beschikbaar is voor de verkoop, moeten we het hebben. Dat wil zeggen dat er geen principieel bezwaar is tegen kernenergie,' aldus de heer Costello.
reference: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation: "The Dutch text is for the record, so we must have it. That means that there is no principle against nuclear energy," Costello said.

source: Volgens Ansa 'was de politie bezorgd over een paar treffers op hoog niveau en vreesde dat hierdoor een regelrechte oorlog voor opvolging zou ontketenen.
reference: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translation: Dutch text: According to Ansa, "the political situation was becoming increasingly tense over a few days, and today a legal deadline for the implementation of the new rules was approaching.

source: De politie vertelde dat Lo Piccolo de overhand had, omdat hij in Palermo de rechterhand van Provenzano is geweest en zijn grotere ervaring hem het respect van de oudere generatie leiders opleverde, aangezien zij het beleid van Provenzano nastreefden om zich zo gedeisd mogelijk te houden, terwijl zij hun machtsnetwerk versterkten.
reference: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translation: Dutch text: Politically, Lo Piccolo had it right, as he was the right-hand man of Provenzano in Palermo and he was the most trusted and respected member of the older generation, who had the power to make or break the organization.

source: Deze bazen waren door Provenzano beteugeld toen hij een einde maakte aan de door de Riina gedreven oorlog tegen de staat die het leven eiste van de maffiabestrijders Giovanni Falcone en Paolo Borsellino in 1992.'
reference: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
translation: Dutch text: These were the doors Provenzano opened for the Riina gang to enter the state, killing the most famous Mafia boss Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992.'

source: Apple CEO Steve Jobs liep het podium op en haalde de iPhone uit zijn broekzak om het apparaat te onthullen.
reference: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translation: Dutch text: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the iPhone on stage and took the device out of his pocket.

source: Tijdens zijn twee uur durende speech zei hij dat 'Apple vandaag de telefoon opnieuw gaat uitvinden en we vandaag geschiedenis gaan schrijven'.
reference: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translation: Dutch text: The Dutch text is a speech by Apple CEO Tim Cook that he gave on Tuesday about the new iPhone and the future of the company.

source: Brazilië is het grootste rooms-katholieke land ter wereld en de rooms-katholieke kerk heeft zich consequent uitgesproken tegen het legaliseren van het homohuwelijk.
reference: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translation: Dutch text: Brazil is the largest room-katholic country in the world and the room-katholic church is the largest in the world in terms of legalization of homosexuality.

source: In het Nationaal Congres van Brazilië werd 10 jaar lang een debat gevoerd over legalisatie. Op dit moment zijn dergelijke burgerlijke huwelijken alleen in Rio Grande do Sul legaal.
reference: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translation: Dutch text: In the National Congress of Brazil, 10 years ago, a debate was held on legalization. At that time, only legalized prostitution was allowed in Rio Grande do Sul.

source: Het originele voorstel was opgesteld door Marta Suplicy, de voormalig burgemeester van São Paulo. Het voorgestelde wetsvoorstel werd eerst gewijzigd en is nu in handen van Roberto Jefferson.
reference: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translation: The original bill was drafted by Marta Suplicy, the former mayor of São Paulo. The amended bill was first proposed by Roberto Jefferson and is now in the hands of the Senate.

source: De betogers hebben de hoop dat ze 1,2 miljoen handtekeningen kunnen verzamelen voor hun petitie, die ze vervolgens aan het Amerikaanse Nationale Congres willen overhandigen in november.
reference: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translation: Dutch text: The Dutch government has announced that it will provide 1.2 million protective masks to the country's small businesses, which are in direct contact with the American National Congress in November.

source: Toen bleek dat veel families juridische hulp zochten om huisuitzettingen te voorkomen, werd op 20 maart een bijeenkomst gehouden in het East Bay Community Law Center voor de slachtoffers van de fraude met woningen.
reference: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translation: Dutch text: Toen bleek dat veel families juridische hulp zochten om huisuitzettingen te voorkomen, werd op 20 maart een bijeenkomst gehouden in het East Bay Community Law Center voor de slachtoffers van de fraude met woningen.

source: Toen de huurders deelden wat hen was overkomen, beseften de meeste families plotseling dat Carolyn Wilson van de OHA hun borg had gestolen en de stad was ontvlucht.
reference: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translation: Dutch text: The housekeeper had reported that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had broken into the house and stolen the contents.

source: De bewoners van Lockwood Gardens zijn bang dat er wellicht nog eens op zijn minst 40 gezinnen uit huis worden gezet, omdat men heeft vernomen dat de OHA-politie (Oakland Housing Authority) ook andere openbare woningen onderzoekt in Oakland die mogelijk betrokken zijn bij de huizenzwendel.
reference: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translation: Dutch text: The lockwood gardens tenants are very upset because they have been told that they will be evicted within 40 days, because they have been named in the Oakland housing authority's (OHA) open housing policy.

source: Het bandoptreden in het War Memorial Stadium in Maui, met naar verwachting 9000 toeschouwers, werd afgezegd, met verontschuldigingen van de band naar de fans.
reference: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translation: The band's farewell concert in the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, with 9,000 people present, was cancelled, with the band's members and fans paying tribute to them.

source: Het management van de band, HK Management Inc. gaf geen expliciete reden op waarom 20 september gecanceld werd, maar een dag later zeiden ze dat het vanwege logistieke redenen was.
reference: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
translation: Dutch text: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., has not given any explanation yet, but a day later they announced that it was due to logistical reasons.

source: Vanwege de veroordeling voor omkoperij en corruptie zitten de bekende Griekse advocaten Sakis Kechagioglou en George Nikolakopoulos gevangen in de Atheense gevangenis van Korydallus.
reference: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translation: Dutch text: In the wake of the corruption scandal involving the Greek bank and the lawyers Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos, the Greek Orthodox Church's supreme court has sentenced the two to prison.

source: Dit resulteerde in een groot schandaal binnen de juridische gemeenschap van Griekenland, waarbij illegale acties die de afgelopen jaren door rechters, juristen, notarissen en advocaten zijn gepleegd naar buiten kwamen.
reference: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
translation: Dutch text: This resulted in a big scandal within the legal community of Griekenland, where lawyers, judges, notaries and solicitors were accused of illegal actions.

source: Een paar weken geleden, nadat journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos informatie publiceerde in zijn populaire televisieprogramma 'Zoungla' op Alpha TV, werd parlementslid en advocaat Petros Mantouvalos afgezet. De aanleiding was dat leden van zijn kantoor betrokken waren bij illegale omkoping en corruptie.
reference: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
translation: Dutch text: A few weeks ago, journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos published information in his popular TV program "Zoungla" on Alpha TV, which led to the resignation of the parliamentary leader and the attorney Petros Mantouvalos. The scandal was exposed by the leak of the internal documents of the parliamentary committee.

source: ost of the buildings on the edges of the complex have beenToprechter Evangelos Kalousis zit daarnaast in de gevangenis omdat men hem schuldig heeft bevonden aan corruptie en ontaard gedrag.
reference: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translation: Dutch text: The buildings on the edges of the complex have been demolished by Toprecher Evangelos Kalousis. He has been arrested for corruption and embezzlement.

source: Roberts weigerde botweg om iets te zeggen over wanneer hij denkt dat het leven begint; een belangrijk vraagstuk wanneer je het hebt over de ethische kant van abortus. Hij stelde dat het onethisch zou zijn om iets te zeggen over de details van specifieke gevallen.
reference: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translation: Dutch text: Roberts weigerde botweg om iets te zeggen over wanneer hij denkt dat het leven begint; a belangrijk vraagstuk wanneer je het hebt over de ethische kant van abortus. Hij stelde dat het onethisch zou zijn om iets te zeggen over de details van specifieke gevallen.

source: Wel herhaalde hij zijn eerdere uitspraak dat Roe vs. Wade de 'vaste wet' was, waarbij hij aangaf hoe belangrijk het is dat de uitspraken van het Hooggerechtshof consequent zijn.
reference: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translation: Dutch text: He translated the following Dutch text, which he had just read, and which he had found very interesting.

source: Hij gaf ook aan dat hij geloofde in het onuitgesproken recht op privacy, waar de uitspraak over Roe van afhing.
reference: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
translation: Dutch text: He is saying that he is willing to give up his right to privacy, where the Roe v. Wade case is concerned.

source: Maroochydore eindigde bovenaan met zes punten verschil van Noosa op de tweede plek.
reference: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translation: Dutch text: Maroochydore had won the toss and elected to bat first against Noosa.

source: De twee partijen ontmoetten elkaar in de grote halve finale, waar Noosa de tegenpartij de baas bleef met een verschil van 11 punten.
reference: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
translation: Dutch text: The two teams are tied for the lead in the halfway point, with Noosa ahead by 11 points.

source: Vervolgens werd in de halve finale Caboolture verslagen door Maroochydore.
reference: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translation: Dutch text: In the quarter finals, Caboolture were defeated by Maroochydore.

source: Hesperonychus elizabethae valt onder de Dromaeosauridae, een neef van de Velociraptor.
reference: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translation: Dutch text: Hesperonychus elizabethae valt onder de Dromaeosauridae, a Velociraptor's tail.

source: Deze warmbloedige roofvogel die volledig gevederd is, zou naar verluid op twee poten rechtop hebben gelopen en zijn klauwen zouden hetzelfde zijn als die van de Velociraptor.
reference: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translation: Dutch text: These very large, well-built birds of prey, like the Velociraptor, had two strong legs and claws like those of a modern day bird.

source: De tweede klauw was groter, waardoor het de naam Hesperonychus kreeg, oftewel 'westerse klauw'.
reference: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translation: The second color was darker, resembling the name Hesperonychus kreeg, which means 'western claw'.

source: Naast het brekende ijs, hebben ook extreme weersomstandigheden reddingsacties belemmerd.
reference: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
translation: Dutch text: In the wake of the recent riots, extreme violence has been reported.

source: Pittman verklaarde dat de condities niet voor volgende week zouden verbeteren.
reference: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
translation: Pittman said the conditions were not good enough to warrant resumption of the drilling.

source: Volgens Pittman is de hoeveelheid en de dikte van het pakijs nog nooit zo slecht geweest voor zeehondenjagers in de laatste vijftien jaar.
reference: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
translation: Dutch text: According to Pittman, the Dutch are the most polite and courteous people in the world.

source: Vandaag bereikte Red Lake het nieuws dat er nog een leerling is gearresteerd in verband met de schietpartijen op 21 maart in de school. Op deze dag vond ook de begrafenis van Jeff Weise en drie van zijn negen slachtoffers plaats.
reference: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translation: Dutch text: On Monday, Red Lake received the news that a student had been arrested in connection with the school's 21 March incident. On that day, Jeff Weise and his two attackers were also arrested.

source: De autoriteiten hebben geen officiële verklaring afgelegd naast de bevestiging van de arrestatie van vandaag.
reference: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
translation: Dutch text: The authorities have no official statement on the arrest of the day.

source: Maar een bron die het onderzoek kent, heeft de Minneapolis Star-Tribune verteld dat het om Louis Jourdain gaat, de 16-jarige zoon van Red Lake Tribal-voorzitter Floyd Jourdain.
reference: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translation: Dutch text: But a source close to the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that Louis Jourdain, 16, of Red Lake Tribal, was the son of Floyd Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of the late Red Lake Tribal chief.

source: Op dit moment is nog niet bekend wat de aanklachten zijn of waarom de jongen door de autoriteiten is opgepakt, maar de jeugdprocedure is van start gegaan bij de federale rechtbank.
reference: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
translation: Dutch text: At this moment, it is not known whether the protest will continue or whether the authorities will allow the protestors to leave the site, but the police have begun arresting protesters.

source: Ook vertelde Lodin dat ambtenaren hadden besloten de hertelling te stoppen om de Afghanen de kosten en het veiligheidsrisico van een nieuwe verkiezing te besparen.
reference: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translation: Dutch text: Lodin, who has been in touch with the Afghan authorities, has told me that the Taliban have not yet agreed to the withdrawal of their forces and that the new security arrangements will not be implemented until after the elections.

source: Diplomaten zeiden dat ze genoeg dubbelzinnigheid hadden gevonden in de Afghaanse grondwet, waardoor een tweede verkiezingsronde niet nodig was.
reference: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translation: Dutch text: Diplomatic efforts to prevent the spread of the disease in Afghanistan have been unsuccessful, and a meeting of the regional coordinating body was called off.

source: Dit spreekt eerdere verslagen tegen dat het annuleren van de tweede verkiezingsronde ongrondwettelijk zou zijn.
reference: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translation: Dutch text: This text is translated from the Dutch version of the same event.

source: Het luchtvaarttuig werd bestuurd door binnenlandse troepen en was op weg naar Irkoetsk.
reference: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
translation: Dutch text: The Dutch East Indies was conquered by the British from the Dutch East Indies.

source: Er wordt een onderzoek ingesteld.
reference: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translation: Dutch text: It's a research project.

source: Sinds ongeveer 1970 is de Il-76 één van de belangrijkste onderdelen van eerst het Sovjetleger en nu ook het Russische leger, dit heeft vorige maand al tot een zwaar ongeval op Russisch gebied geleid.
reference: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translation: Dutch text: The Il-76 has been a part of the Soviet and Russian military since the 1970s, and has already been involved in several accidents in Russia.

source: Op 7 oktober liet de motor tijdens het opstijgen los. Er vielen geen gewonden. Rusland hield de Il-76s na dat ongeluk korte tijd aan de grond.
reference: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translation: Dutch text: On October 7th, the engine stopped working during takeoff. No one was hurt. Russia grounded the Il-76s for a while.

source: Ongeveer 800 mijl van de Trans-Alaska-pijpleiding is afgesloten nadat er duizenden vaten ruwe olie ten zuiden van Fairbanks in Alaska zijn gelekt.
reference: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translation: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System are closed due to a pipeline rupture in Fairbanks, Alaska.

source: Een stroomstoring na een routinematige brandbeveiligingstest zorgde voor een overstroming van de openingen van de ontlastingskleppen en ruwe olie in de buurt van het Fort Greely-pompstation 9.
reference: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translation: Dutch text: A routine leak-testing and a leak-detecting test were carried out for the opening of the valves of the main tank and the oil line leading to the pump station 9 at Fort Greely.

source: Door de opening van de kleppen is het systeem onder druk komen te staan en kon de olie op een pad stromen naar een tank met een capaciteit van 55.000 vaten (2,3 miljoen gallon).
reference: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
translation: Dutch text: Door of opening the door is the system of the druk komen and the tank is connected to a tank with a capacity of 55,000 vatens (2,3 million gallons).

source: Op woensdagmiddag was er nog steeds een lekage in de tankventilatoren. Dit kwam waarschijnlijk door de thermische uitzetting in de tank.
reference: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
translation: Dutch text: On the opening day, a leak was found in the tank ventilation. This was caused by the thermal expansion in the tank.

source: Een tweede beperkingsgebied onder de tanks dat tot 104.500 vaten kan opslaan, was nog niet volledig gevuld.
reference: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
translation: Dutch text: A 104,500 tonne tank barrier under the tanks, which was not yet fully operational.

source: Met deze opmerkingen op livetelevisie gaven hoge Iraanse bronnen voor het eerst toe dat de sancties effect hadden.
reference: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
translation: Dutch text: Watch the following video to learn about the miracle of the Holy Spirit.

source: Dit zijn onder andere financiële beperkingen en een verbod op de export van ruwe olie, opgelegd door de Europese Unie. Meer dan 80% van de buitenlandse inkomsten van de Iraanse economie is afkomstig van deze export.
reference: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
translation: Dutch text: These are other financing mechanisms and a European trade agreement on the export of orange juice, which is 80% of the Dutch economy's income.

source: In het meest recente rapport verklaarde OPEC dat de export van ruwe olie op het dieptepunt van de afgelopen twee decennia is beland met 2,8 miljoen vaten per dag.
reference: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
translation: Dutch text: In the most recent report, OPEC said exports of crude oil had fallen to their lowest level in two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.

source: De hoogste leider de natie, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, heeft de afhankelijkheid van olie beschreven als 'een val' die al voor de islamitische revolutie van Iran in 1979 is opgezet er waaruit het land zich moet bevrijden.
reference: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
translation: The best thing that has happened to the nation, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, is that the country's openness to the outside world has been recognized as a virtue by the Islamic revolution of Iran in 1979.

source: Mensen in Noord-Californië, Oregon, Nevada en Utah krijgen waarschijnlijk een behoorlijke lichtshow voorgeschoteld als de capsule rond 5 uur 's ochtends (oostelijke tijd) de atmosfeer van de aarde binnendringt.
reference: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
translation: Dutch text: Men in North California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah regularly experience a real-life light show as the capsule floats over the water for five hours (daylight time).

source: De capsule heeft erg veel weg van een vallende ster die door de lucht schiet.
reference: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
translation: Dutch text: The capsule has been travelling for a long time with a heavy load of fuel.

source: De capsule reist met een snelheid van 12,8 km of 8 mijl per seconde, waarmee de afstand tussen San Francisco en Los Angeles in één minuut zou worden overbrugd.
reference: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translation: Dutch text: The capsule will travel at a speed of 12.8 km per second, which is 8 miles per second faster than the speed between San Francisco and Los Angeles.

source: Stardust wordt het snelste ruimtevaartuig dat terugkeert naar de aarde. Het vaartuig vestigt een nieuw record en breekt daarmee het oude record dat dateert van mei 1969, toen de Apollo X-commandomodule terugkeerde naar de aarde.
reference: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
translation: Dutch text: Stardust is the fastest object to reach the Earth. The object broke the previous record and set a new one on May 1969, when the Apollo X-command module reached the Earth.

source: 'Het zal zich verplaatsen over de westkust van Noord-Californië en via centraal Oregon, Nevada en Idaho naar Utah de lucht van Californië verlichten,' aldus Tom Duxbury, projectmanager van Stardust.
reference: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
translation: The Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury said the project would be moving over the west coast of North California and through central Oregon, Nevada and Idaho to Utah, where it would be lit by the light of California.

source: Mr. Rudds besluit om het klimaatakkoord van Kyoto te ondertekenen, betekent dat de Verenigde Staten het enige ontwikkelde land is dat de overeenkomst niet heeft ondertekend.
reference: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
translation: Dutch text: Mr. Rudd is trying to get the Kyoto climate agreement signed by the United States, which is a major contributor to the greenhouse gas emissions.

source: De vroegere conservatieve regering in Australië weigerde het Verdrag van Kyoto te ondertekenen, omdat het de economie schade zou toebrengen, vanwege de zware afhankelijkheid van de steenkoolexport, terwijl landen als China en India zich niet aan de emissiedoelstellingen hoefden te houden.
reference: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
translation: Dutch text: The conservative government in Australia has signed the Kyoto Protocol, which has led to the economy being hit hard, as exports have been hit by the price of oil, which is not being taken into account by the emissions trading scheme, which is only for developed countries.

source: Dit is de grootste overname sinds het begin van eBay.
reference: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
translation: Dutch text: This is the biggest online auction site.

source: Het bedrijf is van plan zijn winstbronnen diverser te maken en de populariteit op te vijzelen in landen waar Skype sterk aanwezig is, zoals China, Oost-Europa en Brazilië.
reference: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
translation: Dutch text: The company is a Dutch diversified brewery and is popular in the Netherlands as well as in China, Central Europe and Brazil.

source: Wetenschappers vermoeden dat Enceladus geologisch actief is en ze hebben het vermoeden dat het een potentiële bron is van de ijskoude E-ring van Saturnus.
reference: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
translation: Dutch text: Wetenschappers vermoeden that Enceladus geologically active is a fact that it is a possible source of Saturn's E ring.

source: Enceladus is het meest reflecterende object in het zonnestelsel en weerkaatst ongeveer 90 procent van het zonlicht.
reference: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
translation: Dutch text: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system and accounts for about 90% of the light that comes from the sun.

source: Volgens een Japanse krant van vandaag heeft gamefabrikant Konami besloten de game Six Days in Fallujah niet uit te brengen.
reference: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
translation: Japanese text: After Konami, a Japanese game publisher, announced the game Six Days in Fallujah today, the game has been released in Japan.

source: De game is gebaseerd op de Tweede Slag bij Fallujah, waarbij er een heftige strijd plaatsvond tussen Amerikaanse en Irakese troepen.
reference: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
translation: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.

source: Omdat de video niet op de website van Big Brother is opgeslagen, stelde ACMA bovendien dat Big Brother geen inbreuk heeft gemaakt op online content censuurwetten, ondanks het feit dat de video werd gestreamd op het internet.
reference: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
translation: The video, which was not available on the Big Brother website, was removed by ACMA after it was discovered that Big Brother had not censored the content of the video online.

source: De Radio- en televisiewet reguleert de inhoud op het internet, maar om als internetinhoud te worden beschouwd, moet de inhoud fysiek op een server zijn opgeslagen.
reference: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
translation: Dutch text: The radio and television program is broadcast on the Internet, but if the content is not stored on a server, it must be downloaded.

source: Er werd door de Amerikaanse ambassade in Nairobi, Kenia, een waarschuwing gegeven voor 'extremisten uit Somalië' die van plan zijn in Kenia en Ethiopië zelfmoordaanslagen te plegen.
reference: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
translation: Dutch text: A letter was sent to the American embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, from a "former Somali extremist" who was planning to travel to Kenya and Ethiopia.

source: De VS zegt dat ze informatie hebben ontvangen van een geheime bron over zelfmoordterroristen die belangrijke bezienswaardigheden in Ethiopië en Kenia op willen blazen.
reference: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
translation: Dutch text: The VS says that they have received information from a high-ranking Dutch terrorist who is believed to have planned terrorist attacks in Ethiopia and Kenya.

source: Heck en Johnson hadden al in 1988, toen ze aan UW studeerden en The Daily Show en The Colbert Report nog lang niet bestonden, een idee voor een parodie van nieuws en nieuwsverslagen.
reference: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
translation: Dutch text: Heck and Johnson had al in 1988, they were students at UW, and The Daily Show and The Colbert Report had not yet been launched, so they thought of a parody of news and news reports.

source: Sinds de oprichting van The Onion is het een heus imperium van parodieën op het nieuws geworden met een gedrukte versie, een website die in oktober 5.000.000 unieke bezoekers wist te trekken, persoonlijke advertenties, een 24-uursnieuwsnetwerk, podcasts en een onlangs gepubliceerde atlas: Our Dumb World.
reference: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
translation: The Onion is a parody newspaper, a website that in October 5,000,000 unique visitors visited, personal ads, 24-hour news network, podcasts, and an atlas of the world's stupidity.

source: Al Gore en generaal Tommy Franks vertellen wat hun favoriete krantenkoppen zijn (die van Gore is er een van The Onion, waarin wordt gemeld dat hij en Tipper de beste seks van hun leven hebben gehad na zijn nederlaag van het kiescollege in 2000).
reference: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
translation: Dutch text: Al Gore and Tommy Franks are generally known for their favorite newspaper (The Onion) and they are said to have had the best sex of their lives when they were in high school in 2000.

source: Een groot aantal van hun schrijvers heeft de parodieprogramma's over het nieuws van Jon Stewart en Stephen Colbert sterk beïnvloed.
reference: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
translation: Dutch text: A large number of Dutch comedians have made parodies of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news shows.

source: Het artistieke evenement is ook een onderdeel van een campagne die wordt gevoerd door het stadhuis van Boekarest. Het doel is om het imago van de Roemeense hoofdstad nieuw leven in te blazen als creatieve en kleurrijke metropool.
reference: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
translation: Dutch text: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Boekarest to restore the old city hall. The project is part of the new identity of the Roemish city as creative and colourful metropolis.

source: De stad zal de eerste in het zuidoosten van Europa zijn waar de CowParade wordt gehouden: 's werelds grootste openbare kunstevenement tussen juni en augustus van dit jaar.
reference: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
translation: Dutch text: The city will be the first in Europe to host CowParade, Europe's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

source: De mededeling van vandaag was ook een uitbreiding van de toezegging die de overheid eerder dit jaar in maart deed om extra rijbanen te realiseren.
